1: Written by David at the time the men of Ziph tried to betray him to Saul. Come with great power,[a] O God, and save me! Defend me with your might!
3: For violent men have risen against me—ruthless men who care nothing for God are seeking my life.
4: But God is my helper. He is a friend of mine![b]
5: He will cause the evil deeds of my enemies to boomerang upon them. Do as you promised and put an end to these wicked men, O God.
6: Gladly I bring my sacrifices to you; I will praise your name, O Lord, for it is good.
7: God has rescued me from all my trouble, and triumphed over my enemies.
